code:
%%{HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine}}}%%
%% MPLP SA Profile Lifecycle State Machine
%% Version: 1.0.0 | Frozen: 2025-12-03
%% Schema Reference: schemas/v2/invariants/sa-invariants.yaml

stateDiagram-v2
    direction TB
    
    %% States
    [HealthTech_EMR_Sync] --> Initialize: Boot Runtime
    Initialize --> LoadContext: SA Created (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
    LoadContext --> EvaluatePlan: Context Valid (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
    EvaluatePlan --> ExecuteStep: DAG Resolved
    ExecuteStep --> EmitTrace: Step Done
    EmitTrace --> ExecuteStep: More Steps
    EmitTrace --> Complete: All Steps Done
    Complete --> [HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]: Terminate
    
    %% Error handling
    LoadContext --> Failed: Context Invalid
    EvaluatePlan --> Failed: Plan Invalid
    ExecuteStep --> HandleError: Step Error
    HandleError --> ExecuteStep: Retry
    HandleError --> Failed: Fatal Error
    Failed --> [HealthTech_EMR_Sync]: Terminate
    
    %% State descriptions
    state Initialize {HealthTech_PatientRecords] --> CreateSAInstance
        CreateSAInstance --> GenerateSAId
        GenerateSAId --> EmitSAInitialized
        EmitSAInitialized --> [HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
    }
    
    state LoadContext {HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault] --> ValidateContextId
        ValidateContextId --> CheckContextStatus
        CheckContextStatus --> EmitSAContextLoaded
        EmitSAContextLoaded --> [HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
        
        note right of ValidateContextId
            sa_requires_context:
            context_id must be UUID v4
        end note
        
        note right of CheckContextStatus
            sa_context_must_be_active:
            context.status == 'active'
        end note
    }
    
    state EvaluatePlan {HealthTech_LabAnalyzer] --> ValidatePlanBinding
        ValidatePlanBinding --> ParseSteps
        ParseSteps --> ResolveDependencies
        ResolveDependencies --> BuildExecutionDAG
        BuildExecutionDAG --> EmitSAPlanEvaluated
        EmitSAPlanEvaluated --> [HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
        
        note right of ValidatePlanBinding
            sa_plan_context_binding:
            plan.context_id == context.context_id
        end note
        
        note right of ParseSteps
            sa_plan_has_steps:
            steps.length >= 1
            sa_steps_agent_role_if_present:
            if agent_role present, non-empty
        end note
    }
    
    state ExecuteStep {HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault] --> SelectExecutor
        SelectExecutor --> RunExecution
        RunExecution --> UpdateStepStatus
        UpdateStepStatus --> [HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
        
        note right of SelectExecutor
            Match agent_role to executor
            (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
        end note
    }
    
    state EmitTrace {HealthTech_LabAnalyzer] --> WriteSegment
        WriteSegment --> RecordOutcome
        RecordOutcome --> EmitSATraceEmitted
        EmitSATraceEmitted --> [HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
        
        note right of WriteSegment
            sa_trace_context_binding:
            trace.context_id == context.context_id
            sa_trace_plan_binding:
            trace.plan_id == plan.plan_id
        end note
    }
    
    state Complete {HealthTech_PatientRecords] --> FinalizeTrace
        FinalizeTrace --> EmitSACompleted
        EmitSACompleted --> [HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
    }
    
    state HandleError {HealthTech_EMR_Sync] --> ClassifyError
        ClassifyError --> DecideAction
        DecideAction --> [HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
    }

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 我们需要加一个处理 HealthTech_EMR_Sync 和 HealthTech_LabAnalyzer 的环节。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'HealthTech_EMR_Sync 和 HealthTech_LabAnalyzer'？
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 HealthTech_LabAnalyzer 和 HealthTech_PatientRecords 的环节。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'HealthTech_LabAnalyzer 和 HealthTech_PatientRecords'。
可以，继续吧。
